duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and implement learning programs and required trainings for employees, managers, and leaders.
Maintain and assess current Learning Management System (LMS) and Ethics case management system (Navex); identifies and recommends improvements for efficiency.
Provide support for other Learning & Development projects and initiatives to improve and maintain HR systems.
Assist the legal Ethics & Compliance team with data analysis, Navex administration, and case management support.
Audit HR systems for data integrity and accurate reporting.
Develop and maintain organizational communication and marketing to ensure employees have knowledge of training and development events and resources.
Assist with HRIS maintenance, reporting, and other projects as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in HR Management, Business Administration, or a related field (Master's preferred)
